task: Upload a video file as a video to a YouTube channel.
Delete a specific video from a channel.
Edit video details such as title, description, and tags.
Set a specific time for a video to be made public.
Generate new playlists for categorizing videos.
Insert specific videos into an existing playlist.
Delete videos from a playlist.
Modify the channel description, profile picture, and other details.
Access analytics such as views, watch time, and subscriber count for specific videos.
Acquire broader analytics for the entire channel.
Understand user engagement by capturing data on likes, dislikes, and comments.
Automatically post preset comments or updates in the comment section of a video.
Remove specific comments that violate community guidelines.
Generate automated replies to user comments.
Control the ad settings for specific videos.
Fetch details about earnings, including estimated revenue and ad performance.
Change the payment and billing information for the channel.
Automatically upload caption files to videos.
Replace or update existing captions.
Remove captions from a specific video.
Conduct a search for videos based on specific keywords or criteria.
Retrieve a specific video using its unique ID.
Obtain a list of currently trending videos in a specific region or category.
Set up a future live stream event.
Initiate or end a live stream.
Automatically post messages, moderate comments, or collect metrics from a live chat during a live stream.
Automate the process of subscribing to other YouTube channels.
Remove existing subscriptions.
Alert subscribers when new content is available or when a live stream is starting.
